EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Pivotal FOSDEM Dinner_Q116.Thank you Dinner
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you from Pivotal!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.mirabelle.be/]]> HI {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We would like to thank you for supporting and speaking at FOSDEM 2016 - HPC, Big Data, and Data Science Dev Room. The Pivotal open source community would like to invite you to dinner at Mirabelle <[[http://www.mirabelle.be/]]> Restaurant. Details below:
Date: January 30, 2016 Time: 7:00 PM Location: Mirabelle <[[http://www.mirabelle.be/]]> Restaurant, 459, chauss√©e de Boondael 1050 Bruxelles and it's an ~8min walk from the FOSDEM campus.
See you Saturday night, and again Sunday morning!
Have a great FOSDEM!
Regards, Pivotal open source community team
